name: Shanhaijing Melee
description:
[The Game Dev Is Not Finished Yet]

A melee game tell the story about monsters in Shanhaijing.

In this game, you don't have HP, instead, There're `energy` and `awareness`.

Each action cost `energy`, once the `energy` is empty, you will get into tired mode that you can not move. `Energy` is grow back slowly.

When you are hitted, the `awareness` will increase. And the `awareness` decrease slowly by time. Once the `awareness` is full, you lose.
